label: 4G coverage
subtitle: Percentage of area with 4G coverage from at least one mobile network provider
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of geographic areas with 4G signal outdoors from at least 1 operator (signal threshold: 105dBm), in the UK, as of September 2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Net additions to the housing stock
subtitle: Net additions to the stock of dwellings per 1,000 dwellings
sourceOrg: Department for Levelling Up, Housing and Communities
longDescription: This dataset shows the net additions to the dwelling stock (including new builds, conversions, changes of use, other gains/losses and offset by demolitions) per 1,000 stock, in England, for financial year 2022 - 2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Level 3 or above qualifications
subtitle: Percentage of people aged 16 to 64 with Level 3 or above qualifications
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of the population aged 16 – 64 with National Vocational Qualification (NVQ) level 3+ qualifications, in Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), for 2004 - 2021.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Further education and skills learner achievements
subtitle: Count of learners aged 19 years and over achieving a funded further education and skills learning aim (with the exception of community learning)
longDescription: This dataset shows the count of learners achieving a funded further education and skills learning aim, with the exception of community learning, non-qualification parts of the Multiply programme and bootcamps, in England, for academic years 2016/17 to 2021/22.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Further education and skills participation
subtitle: People aged 19 and above participating in further education and skills learning (including apprenticeships), per 100,000 people
longDescription: This dataset shows 19+ further education and skills participation rate per 100,000 population, in England, for full academic years 2017/18 to 2022/23.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Anxiety
subtitle: Average rating for anxiety during previous day (0 = 'not at all anxious', 10 = 'completely anxious') for people aged 16 and over
longDescription: This dataset shows the average rating of those that felt anxious yesterday (where 0 is 'not at all anxious' and 10 is 'completely anxious'), for adults aged 16 years and over, in the UK, for periods 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Feeling life is worthwhile
subtitle: Average rating that the things they do in life are worthwhile (0 = 'not at all worthwhile', 10 = 'completely worthwhile') for people aged 16 and over
longDescription: This dataset shows the average rating of those that feel the things they do in life are worthwhile (where 0 is 'not at all worthwhile' and 10 is 'completely worthwhile'), for adults aged 16 years and over, in the UK, for periods 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Happiness
subtitle: Average rating for happiness during previous day (0 = 'not at all happy', 10 = 'completely happy') for people aged 16 and over
longDescription: This dataset shows the average rating of those that felt happy yesterday (where 0 is 'not at all happy' and 10 is 'completely happy'), for adults aged 16 years and over, in the UK, for periods 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Life satisfaction
subtitle: Average rating of life satisfaction (0 = 'not at all satisfied', 10 = 'completely satisfied') for people aged 16 and over
longDescription: This dataset shows the average rating of those that feel satisfied about their lives (where 0 is 'not at all satisfied' and 10 is 'completely satisfied'), for adults aged 16 years and over, in the UK, for periods 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Travel time to employment centre by bicycle
subtitle: Average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500+ jobs available
longDescription: This dataset shows the average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500 to 4999 jobs available by cycle (official statistics in development), in England, for periods 2014-2019.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Travel time to employment centre by car
subtitle: Average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500+ jobs available
longDescription: This dataset shows the average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500 to 4999 jobs available by car (official statistics in development), in England, for periods 2014-2019.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Travel time to employment centre by public transport and walking
subtitle: Average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500+ jobs available
longDescription: This dataset shows the average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500 to 4999 jobs available by public transport or walking (official statistics in development), in England, for periods 2014-2019.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Cancer diagnosis at stage 1 and 2
subtitle: New cases of cancer diagnosed at stages 1 and 2 as a percentage of all new cases of cancer diagnosed at any known stage
sourceOrg: Office for Health Improvement and Disparities
longDescription: This dataset shows new cases of cancer diagnosed at stages 1 and 2 as a percentage of all new cases of cancer diagnosed at any known stage, in England, for 2013 to 2021.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Preventable circulatory mortality (England)
subtitle: Age-standardised mortality from circulatory diseases considered preventable for people aged under 75
sourceOrg: Office for Health Improvement and Disparities
longDescription: This dataset shows the age-standardised mortality rate from circulatory diseases considered preventable for those aged under 75 per 100,000 population (2019 definition), in England, for three-year rolling periods 2001-2003 to 2020-2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Cigarette smokers
subtitle: Percentage of people aged 18 and over who state they currently smoke cigarettes (excluding e-cigarettes)
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of adults (18+) who state they currently smoke cigarettes (excluding e-cigarettes), in the United Kingdom, for 2012 - 2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Employment rate (Great Britain)
subtitle: Percentage of people aged 16 to 64 in employment
longDescription: This dataset shows the proportion of people aged between 16 and 64 years in paid work or who had a job that they were temporarily away from, in Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), for periods 10/2004-09/2005 to 10/2022-09/2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Economic inactivity rate (Great Britain)
subtitle: Percentage of people aged 16 to 64 who are not in employment and are not actively seeking work
longDescription: This dataset shows the proportion of people aged between 16 and 64 years who are not in employment but do not meet the internationally accepted definition of unemployment because they have not been seeking work within the last four weeks or they are unable to start work in the next two weeks, in Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), for periods 10/2004-09/2005 to 10/2022-09/2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Female healthly life expectancy
subtitle: Average years expected to be lived in good health for females born during year
longDescription: This dataset shows the average years expected to be lived in good health for females born during the reference period, in the United Kingdom, for calendar years 2011 - 2013 to 2018 - 2020.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: GCSEs in English and Maths
subtitle: Percentage of people achieving GCSEs in both subjects by age 19
longDescription: This dataset shows GCSEs (and equivalent) in English and maths by age 19, in England, for academic years 2016/17 to 2021/22.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Gigabit capable broadband
subtitle: Percentage of premises with 125 megabytes or greater of broadband speed
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of premises with 125 megabytes (MB) or greater, in the UK, as of September 2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Gross disposable household income
subtitle: Average income per person after taxes and direct benefits
longDescription: This dataset shows an estimate of the amount of money each individual within a household has available for spending or saving after they have paid taxes and received any direct benefits, in the UK, for 1997-2021.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Gross median weekly pay
subtitle: Average weekly pay based on where people live
sourceOrg: Office for National Statistics|Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
longDescription: This dataset shows the average (median) weekly pay based on where people live, in the UK, for 2002-2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Gross value added per hour worked
subtitle: Estimated value of goods and services produced per hour worked
sourceOrg: Office for National Statistics|Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
longDescription: This dataset shows the measure of business productivity (estimate of the volume of goods and services produced) in £ per hour worked (official statistics in development), in the UK, for 2004-2021.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Homicide offences
subtitle: Homicide offences per million people
sourceOrg: Office for National Statistics|Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
longDescription: This dataset shows the rate of Homicide offences per million population, in England and Wales, for period 04/2020-03/2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Male healthy life expectancy
subtitle: Average years expected to be lived in good health for males born during year
longDescription: This dataset shows the average years expected to be lived in good health for males born during the reference period, in the United Kingdom, for calendar years 2011 - 2013 to 2018 - 2020.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Persistent absences for all pupils
subtitle: Percentage of pupils in state-funded schools that were absent for 10% of academic year
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of pupils in state-funded primary, state funded secondary and special schools that were persistently absent (those absent for 10% of schooling sessions) during the academic year, in England (state-funded schools), for academic years 2008/09 - 2021/22.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Persistent absences for pupils eligible for free school meals
subtitle: Percentage of FSM-eligible pupils in state-funded schools that were absent for 10% of academic year
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of pupils in state-funded primary, state funded secondary and special schools who have been eligible for free school meals in the past 6 years that were persistently absent (those absent for 10% of schooling sessions) during the academic year, in England (state-funded schools), for academic years 2017/18 - 2021/22.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Persistent absences for pupils looked after by local authorities
subtitle: Percentage of pupils looked after continuously by local authorities for at least 12 months that were absent for 10% of academic year
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of pupils in state-funded primary, state funded secondary, special schools and pupil referral units who have been looked after continuously for at least 12 months (as of 31 March of that year) by local authorities who were persistently absent (those absent for 10% of schooling sessions) during the academic year, in England (state-funded primary and secondary schools, special schools and pupil referral units), for financial years 2016/17 - 2021/22.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Pupils at expected standards at the end of key stage 2
subtitle: Percentage of pupils in state-funded schools meeting the expected standard in reading, writing and maths
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of pupils in state-funded schools meeting the expected standard in reading, writing and maths at the end of key stage 2, in England state-funded schools, for academic years 2015/16 - 2022/23.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Schools and nurseries rated good or outstanding
subtitle: Percentage of state-funded schools rated good or outstanding by Ofsted
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of state-funded Nursery schools, Primary schools, Secondary schools, Alternative Provision (AP) schools and Special schools that are rated ‘Good’ or ‘Outstanding’ by Ofsted, in England (state-funded schools), as at 31 January 2024.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Value of UK exports
subtitle: Estimated total value of UK exports including trade in both goods and services
longDescription: This dataset shows the estimated total value of UK exports including trade in both goods and services (official statistics in development), in the UK, for 2021.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Economic inactivity rate (Northern Ireland)
subtitle: Percentage of people aged 16 to 64 who are not in employment and are not actively seeking work
sourceOrg: Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
longDescription: This dataset shows the proportion of people aged between 16 and 64 years who are not in employment but do not meet the internationally accepted definition of unemployment because they have not been seeking work within the last four weeks or they are unable to start work in the next two weeks, in Northern Ireland, for 2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Employment rate (Northern Ireland)
subtitle: Percentage of people aged 16 to 64 in employment
sourceOrg: Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
longDescription: This dataset shows the proportion of people aged between 16 and 64 years in paid work or who had a job that they were temporarily away from, in Northern Ireland, for 2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Research and development expenditure
subtitle: Public-funded gross expenditure within this region
longDescription: This dataset shows the total UK public-funded gross regional capital and non-capital expenditure on research and development (official statistics in development), in the UK, for financial year 2020 - 2021.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Inward foreign direct investment
subtitle: Value of foreign direct investments (FDI) in the UK from non-resident companies
longDescription: This dataset shows the total FDI international investment position in the UK (inward) at end period (official statistics in development), in Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), for 2015-2021.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Outward foreign direct investment
subtitle: Value of foreign direct investments (FDI) of UK-resident companies in other countries
longDescription: This dataset shows the total FDI international investment position abroad (outward) at end period (official statistics in development), in Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), for 2015-2021.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Communication and language skills by end of early years foundation stage
subtitle: Percentage of 5 year olds at 'expected level' across all communication and language early learning goals
longDescription: This dataset shows the early years foundation stage profile outcomes of five year olds. Percentage at 'expected level' across all communication and language early learning goals, in England (state-funded schools), for academic years 2021/22 to 2022/23.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Literacy skills by end of early years foundation stage
subtitle: Percentage of 5 year olds at 'expected level' across all literacy early learning goals
longDescription: This dataset shows the early years foundation stage profile outcomes of five year olds. Percentage at 'expected level' across all literacy early learning goals, in England (state-funded schools), for academic years 2021/22 to 2022/23.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Maths skills by end of early years foundation stage

longDescription: This dataset shows the early years foundation stage profile outcomes of five year olds. Percentage at 'expected level' across all mathematics early learning goals, in England (state-funded schools), for academic years 2021/22 to 2022/23.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

code: child-obesity-Aged four to five years underweight

longDescription: This dataset shows the proportion of children aged 4-5 years (reception age) classified as underweight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2022/23.

longDescription: This dataset shows the proportion of children aged 4-5 years (reception age) classified as healthy weight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2022/23.

longDescription: This dataset shows the proportion of children aged 4-5 years (reception age) classified as overweight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2022/23.

longDescription: This dataset shows the proportion of children aged 10-11 years (Year 6 age) classified as healthy weight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2022/23.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Overweight prevalence in children at Year 6 age
subtitle: Percentage of children aged 10-11 classified as overweight
sourceOrg: Office for Health Improvement and Disparities
longDescription: This dataset shows the proportion of children aged 10-11 years (Year 6 age) classified as overweight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2022/23.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Obesity prevalence in children at Year 6 age
subtitle: Percentage of children aged 10-11 classified as living with obesity
sourceOrg: Office for Health Improvement and Disparities
longDescription: This dataset shows the proportion of children aged 10-11 years (Year 6 age) classified as obese (including severe obesity), in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2022/23.

label: Preventable circulatory mortality (Northern Ireland)
subtitle: Age-standardised mortality from circulatory diseases considered preventable for people aged under 75
longDescription: This dataset shows the age-standardised mortality rate from circulatory diseases considered preventable for those aged under 75 per 100,000 population (2019 definition), in Northern Ireland, for 2001 to 2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Business births
subtitle: Count of newly active businesses based on turnover or employment
longDescription: This dataset shows the count of business births, in the UK, for 2017 to 2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Business deaths
subtitle: Count of businesses ceasing activity based on turnover or employment
longDescription: This dataset shows the count of business deaths, in the UK, for 2017 to 2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Active businesses
subtitle: Businesses with turnover or employment in current year
longDescription: This dataset shows the count of acrive businesses, in the UK, for 2017 to 2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: High growth businesses
subtitle: Businesses with an average growth in employment of greater than 20% per year over a three-year period
longDescription: This dataset shows the count of high growth businesses, in the UK, for 2017 to 2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Apprenticeship starts
subtitle: Apprenticeship programme starts by people aged 16 or above, per 100,000 people
longDescription: This dataset shows apprenticeships started by adults aged 16+ based on home address, rate per 100,000 population, in England, for full academic years 2017/18 to 2022/23.

label: Apprenticeship achievements
subtitle: Apprenticeship programme achievements by people aged 16 or above, per 100,000 people
longDescription: This dataset shows apprenticeships achieved by adults aged 16+ based on home address, rate per 100,000 population, in England, for full academic years 2017/18 to 2022/23.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Modelled unemployment rate
subtitle: Modelled percentage of economically active people aged 16 years and over without a job and actively seeking work
longDescription: This dataset shows modelled-based estimates for the proportion of economically active people aged 16 years and over without a job who have been actively seeking work within the last four weeks and are available to start work within the next two weeks, in Great Britain, for periods 10/2004-09/2005 to 10/2022-09/2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Level 3 or above qualifications (Northern Ireland)
subtitle: Percentage of people aged 16 to 64 with Level 3 or above qualifications
sourceOrg: Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of the population aged 16 to 64 with National Vocational Qualification (NVQ) level 3+ qualifications, in Northern Ireland, for 2016 to 2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Adult obesity prevalence
subtitle: Percentage of adults aged 18 and over classified as living with obesity
sourceOrg: Office for Health Improvement and Disparities
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of adults aged 18 and over classified as living with obesity, in England, for 16/11/2015-15/11/2016 to 16/11/2021-15/11/2022.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.

label: Population under devolution deal in England
subtitle: Percentage of the population living in an area covered by the highest level of devolution in England
longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of the population living in an area covered by the highest level of devolution, in England, as of 13 January 2023.
coverageLevel: Data for this indicator is available for local authorities from XXX to YYY, and for regions and countries from ZZZ to QQQ.
